abstract: First-quarter profit was up 36 percent as economic growth and supply disruptions drove crude prices above $100 a barrel.
snippet: First-quarter profit was up 36 percent as economic growth and supply disruptions drove crude prices above $100 a barrel.
lead_paragraph: The Chevron Corporation said Friday that its first-quarter profit rose 36 percent as economic growth and supply disruptions drove crude prices above $100 a barrel.

headline.main: Chevron Profit Rises as Unrest Lifts Oil Prices
headline.print_headline: Chevron Profit Rises as Unrest Lifts Oil Prices
